pullrequest.title: Get plugin info with Ignition transport service

content.raw: I just ran a world with a model plugin and everything seems to work. I can click on the model and I see the plugin with the `name`, `filename` and `innerxml` properties. However, the `innerxml` property is hard to see/use because the content can be arbitrary big and is hard to see it on the widget. My first instinct is to remove it from the GUI unless someone has a more creative idea to visualize it.
content.html: I just ran a world with a model plugin and everything seems to work. I can click on the model and I see the plugin with the name, filename and innerxml properties. However, the innerxml property is hard to see/use because the content can be arbitrary big and is hard to see it on the widget. My first instinct is to remove it from the GUI unless someone has a more creative idea to visualize it.
